Text: Hi sailo. Thanks for all the great uploads on PB. Could you tell me if this is a PAL or NTSC. Most of your releases list it, but some like this one don't :(   Thanks in advance
When the languages of the soundtrack are English/Spanish/Portuguese you can generally assume it's a Region 1 NTSC DVD made for USA-Canada/Latin America/Brazil.
The subtitles are also in Dutch and Slovenian, who in America speaks dutch or Slovenian? the movie must be  in PAL. English, Spanish and Portuguese are also  spoken in Europe not only in America.
